sentences.en: British TV commercials are glossy and sophisticated.
sentences.cn: 英国的电视广告光艳浮华，矫揉造作。

sentences.en: He extracted several glossy prints and spread them out on a low coffee table.
sentences.cn: 他掏出几张光面照片，将它们摆在一张矮茶几上。

sentences.en: He tickled gently at its glossy carapace,but the stubborn beetle would not budge.
sentences.cn: 他轻轻地搔着甲虫光滑的壳，但这只固执的甲虫就是不动。

sentences.en: Her hair was thick, glossy and in tip-top condition.
sentences.cn: 她的头发浓密亮泽，发质好得没话说。
我喜欢这些闪闪发光的花点.

sentences.en: Our cat has glossy black fur.
sentences.cn: 我们的猫的毛皮又黑又亮.

sentences.en: Prints are available on matt or glossy paper.
sentences.cn: 粗面相片或光面相片均可洗印。

sentences.en: The furniture on it is glossy vermilion.
sentences.cn: 上面的家具色彩鲜红，富有光泽。

sentences.en: the glossy surface of the leaves
The horse's coat was sleek and glossy.
The leaves were dark and glossy.
sentences.cn: 树叶颜色深暗，颇有光泽。

sentences.en: The porcelain is fine and glossy.
The ship would lie there mirrored in a perfectly unmoving glossy sea.
sentences.cn: 船会停靠在那里，映衬在一片波澜不兴的湛蓝海水之中。

sentences.en: Their glossy barks are a faint light green with hazy silver spots.
sentences.cn: 它的皮,光滑而有银色的晕圈,微微泛出淡青色.

sentences.en: Very dark glossy lips look wrong with heavily made-up eyes.
sentences.cn: 涂有深色唇彩的嘴唇看上去和浓艳的眼妆不相称。

sentences.en: When hair is dry, rub in a little oil to make it smooth and glossy.
sentences.cn: 等头发干了以后，搽上一点油，使其顺滑而有光泽。

trans.tran_cn: 有光泽的，光滑的，虚有其表的，似是而非的
用亮光纸印刷的杂志，印在光纸上的相片
